author: DistroTube
description:
Today, I'm showing my preferred method of installing Debian, using the mini.iso. I am also going to install Debian "unstable" as opposed to "stable." There are no "unstable" ISOs so using the mini.iso and the "expert install" option is an easy way to install "unstable."

DEBIAN'S MINI ISO:
► https://d-i.debian.org/daily-images/amd64/daily/netboot/

title: How To Easily Install Debian Unstable
